page.title: 04A Day in my life-2 Afternoon
page.content: I have a packed lunch so I go into dinner after the people who have cooked school lunches. Then I go out to play with my friends. At 1.00pm dinner break ends and we go back to work. Sometimes we carry on with work from the morning, but often we start new work. It is 2.00pm when we stop work and have a short break of 15 minutes. We return to work until 3.00pm when we finish school for the day. During the day, some of the subjects we do include maths, English, reading, science, music, art, craft, and projects. Sometimes I stay for clubs or I go home and change my clothes before I go out with my friends. I have tea at 5.30pm. In the summer I go out again until 7.30pm when I go in to watch T.V. until 8.30pm when I have my supper and get ready for bed at 9.00pm.
